title: GUARANTEE CLAIM
description: Use the guide below to understand the steps involved in making a roofing product guarantee claim.

claim_steps.title: How To Claim Guarantee
claim_steps.step1Description: Review your warranty terms to make sure the issue is covered before starting a claim.
claim_steps.step2Description: Collect proof of purchase, photos of the issue, and any other relevant documents.
claim_steps.step3Description: Reach out to our support team to start the claim process or ask any questions.
claim_steps.step4Description: Our team will review your claim and may schedule an inspection to assess the issue
claim_steps.step5Description: Once reviewed, we will inform you of the decision and the next steps to resolve your claim.

authorization.title: Warranty Authorization Claim Form
authorization.description: Every panel comes with a 10-year corrosion warranty and a 5-year warranty on sand adhesive and colors, giving you confidence in long-lasting performance. To make it clear and easy, each product carries a sticker that details these warranty terms for quick reference.
